headline: Piper Sandler upgrades Fortinet on firewall refresh optimism
summary: Investing.com -- Piper Sandler upgraded Fortinet Inc (NASDAQ:FTNT) to "overweight" with a $120 price target given strong prospects for a firewall refresh cycle set to accelerate in 2025. The brokerage sees Fortinet as the "best way to play" this trend, driven by improving IT spending and increased focus on cybersecurity amid geopolitical tensions and the rise of generative AI threats.
